Translations.Text: Ona noted those je dat part z scripture ako they invited uphold this scripture GOD apply it ich own zivy potom some z them turn aversion
This because they said hellfire nie touch us a few dni. They thus klamat ich nabozenstvo ich own fabrications
Ako it robit for them when my je zvolat them ze inevitable dni? Each soul je platit for whatever it zarabat maly injustice

Say Our god possessor all sovereignty! Ona grant sovereignty whomever Ona zvolit si Ona zosadit sovereignty whomever Ona zvolit si. Ona grant dignity whomever Ona zvolit si commit do humiliation whomever Ona zvolit si. Do Tvoj hand bol all provisions Ona bol Omnipotent
Ona merge night dni merge dni night. Ona produce zivy dead produce dead z zivy Ona zadovazit for whomever Ona zvolit si limits
believers never ally disbelievers believers. Whoever robit this exiled GOD Exempted som those forced robi this avoid persecution! GOD alerts ONA ZE ONA reverence Him alone Do GOD bol ultimate destiny
Say Whether ona zatajit tvoj innermost myslienka declare it GOD je fully aware thereof. He bol fully aware z everything do heavens zem! GOD bol Omnipotent
